metadata.name: Double alter ego
metadata.description:
If the bid gets higher than 10 ETH, the winner will get a real "Not a Flamethrower" delivered to their home.

---
In this work we see two figures portrayed: in the upper part we see the personification of Death, a dark black and frightening figure, who places his skeletal hands on his opposite, a female figure, beautiful and colorful, made up with a style that recalls that of the tradition of Santa Muerte.

The position of the hands on the shoulders demonstrates a sort of complicity between the two, and not an attitude.

Both, each in his own way, look directly at the viewer, with a very serious and almost threatening air. The female figure, behind her charm, hides the fact that she is a disciple of Death itself.

The woman, among other things, presents a singular detail: she holds an unusual weapon in her arms. The weapon that the woman is carrying looks like a flamethrower, but ...read more at https://utiq.art
